Text:
seems the installer and the files in installs
are identical to the free version.
copying the branding.dll to your free install will turn that into the pro version.
@xpmole: ya you got right, Not only branding.dll but .dat file contain registring details too, these both files turn it to pro version, also you can update program anytime if availble

Good release and good job !
And thank you very much for taking the time and effort to share with us all :)

ps:
and yeah i did copy the other files too ;)
I looked at  changing the resources strings just for the hell of it but the branding.dll has a digital cert. You can get a command line tool online that strips away the cert data on an .exe or .dll etc and it works great but i figured i'd just leave it alone.
If interested google for "delcert.exe"
or go here..
forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?p=2508061
Can you update this cracked version?

No longer works; license invalid.

(They caught that quick!)
